author: Nektaria Stamouli
title: Nicos Anastasiades Is Re-elected President of Cyprus in Runoff Poll
text:
Center-right candidate Nicos Anastasiades was comfortably re-elected president of Cyprus in a runoff election on Sunday, beating rival Stavros Malas, an independent backed by Communist party AKEL.
The conservative leader secured 55.99% support, while Mr. Malas was backed by 44.01% of those who voted.
